issue.title: [CF 1187] Error building meta list
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Create new blank meta list with blank default group 1 2. Select Group 1 in the pull down 3. Check then uncheck group controller

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead? should not error out

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version) 7.4.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?

2 errors

first:

``` ...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:203: attempt to index field 'IconsLookup' (a nil value) ...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:203: in function <...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:198> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.4.0.lua:1618: in function `Fire' TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:996: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:799> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group-Group.lua:512: in function `Setup' [string "*:OnLoad"]:13: in function <[string "*:OnLoad"]:12> (tail call): ? ...aceTellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options-7.4.0.lua:1726: in function <...aceTellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1699> Locals: nil ```

second

``` 8x ...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:191: attempt to index field 'IconsLookup' (a nil value) ...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:191: in function <...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:184> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.4.0.lua:1618: in function `Fire' [string "SetInfo shown"]:75: in function `?' TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:1309: in function `SetInfo' TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:219: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:218> [C]: in function `Hide' TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:760: in function `DisableIcon' TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:849: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:799> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group-Group.lua:512: in function `Setup' [string "*:OnLoad"]:13: in function <[string "*:OnLoad"]:12> (tail call): ? ...aceTellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options-7.4.0.lua:1726: in function <...aceTellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1699> Locals: nil ```

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

This was on an alt with a blank profile (nothing set at all)

I simply pulled down meta icon, pulled down under component icons & groups and selected group 1 (which was at the default and not populated at all), checked group controller then unchecked it.


> Posted by CurseForge user transitbus | Imported from CurseForge issue #1187 | Raw
